title: That’s Fine~
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Haaah~, it’s so warm by the window~. It just gets you sleepy, right~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Hey Kanata, I want to ask you something<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Go ahead~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You always act so natural no matter who you’re with, Kanata. How can you be like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hnn~, that’s probably because everyone understands me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>.... That’s it? Is there any other reason for it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Isn’t that enough? Everyone accepts me even if Kanata always dozes off. And so do you, right, Maki-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well, that’s true....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata is sure of this, but. Kanata thinks everyone understands that you can’t be honest, but you’re always honest, Maki-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wha-, I’m not really worried about that, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
